items.name: Warri Ocean Wonders
items.short_description: Explore the vibrant marine life of the Atlantic and local Delta rivers in an immersive and educational setting. Features large tanks and fascinating exhibits.
items.address: 12 Marine Drive, Effurun, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Delta Deep Dive Aquarium
items.short_description: A unique aquarium focusing on the diverse freshwater and brackish water ecosystems of the Niger Delta. Discover rare local species and their habitats.
items.address: Sapele-Warri Road, near Ekpan Junction, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Aqua Kids Discovery Centre
items.short_description: Designed for young explorers, this interactive centre features touch tanks, feeding sessions, and engaging exhibits to spark curiosity about aquatic creatures.
items.address: 5 Okumagba Avenue, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Riverine Realm Aquarium
items.short_description: Step into a world showcasing the rich biodiversity of Warri's riverine environment. Learn about different fish species, reptiles, and amphibians native to the region.
items.address: Plot 20, Bendel Estate, Off Airport Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Tales of Warri Garden
items.short_description: A serene park where Warri's rich oral traditions and folklore come alive. Listen to engaging stories under ancient trees and explore cultural sculptures.
items.address: 15 Okere Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: The Imagination Grove
items.short_description: An interactive park where children can immerse themselves in diverse stories through themed play areas, puppet shows, and storytelling sessions.
items.address: Off Jakpa Road, near Ugbomro, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Adventure Narratives Park
items.short_description: Embark on a quest through this park, where each path leads to a new part of an ongoing adventure story. Solve riddles and discover hidden treasures.
items.address: Plot 7, Refinery Road, Ekpan, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Whispering Woods Storyland
items.short_description: A tranquil park set amidst lush greenery, perfect for quiet reflection and listening to gentle nature-themed stories. Picnic spots available.
items.address: Enerhen Road, Ugborikoko, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Jurassic Jungle Warri
items.short_description: Step back in time to the age of dinosaurs! Encounter life-sized animatronic dinosaurs hidden in a lush, prehistoric jungle setting.
items.address: Airport Road, near NNPC Housing Complex, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Dino Dig Discovery Zone
items.short_description: Become a paleontologist for a day! Children can unearth replica fossils in sand pits and learn about different dinosaur species and their history.
items.address: 8 Enerhen Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Prehistoric Playground
items.short_description: A dinosaur-themed playground featuring giant dinosaur structures for climbing, slides, and swings. Perfect for active kids who love dinosaurs.
items.address: Ugborikoko Layout, Off PTI Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Mesozoic Era Expedition
items.short_description: A guided walking tour through different zones representing the Triassic, Jurassic, and Cretaceous periods, with realistic dinosaur models and informative displays.
items.address: Along NPA Expressway, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Warri WonderWorks Museum
items.short_description: A hands-on museum blending science, art, and local culture. Exhibits encourage exploration and critical thinking for children of all ages.
items.address: 45 Airport Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Little Explorers Museum
items.short_description: Specifically designed for toddlers and preschoolers, offering safe, engaging activities that promote early learning and sensory development.
items.address: 10 PTI Road, Effurun, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Creative Corner Children's Museum
items.short_description: A haven for budding artists and performers, offering workshops in painting, music, drama, and various crafts, fostering creativity and self-expression.
items.address: 27 Ajamimogha Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Future Innovators Lab
items.short_description: A cutting-edge museum focused on technology, engineering, and robotics. Children can engage with interactive displays, coding games, and build their own creations.
items.address: Plot 18, Warri-Sapele Road, near Enerhen, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Enchanted Delta Forest
items.short_description: Wander through a magical forest filled with characters and scenes from beloved fairy tales, both local and international. Features whimsical paths and hidden surprises.
items.address: 33 Efurrun-Sapele Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Princess & Knights Kingdom
items.short_description: Enter a medieval realm where children can dress up as princes, princesses, or knights, explore a miniature castle, and participate in royal games and parades.
items.address: Off Airport Road, Ugborikoko, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Magical Storybook Land
items.short_description: A walk-through attraction where classic fairy tale scenes are brought to life with animated figures and immersive soundscapes. Perfect for family photos.
items.address: 12 Okere-Urhobo Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Pixie Hollow Gardens
items.short_description: A whimsical garden filled with vibrant flowers, tiny fairy houses, and hidden paths. Children can search for miniature magical creatures and enjoy nature's beauty.
items.address: Off Jakpa Road, Opete, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Warri Heritage Farm
items.short_description: Experience traditional farming practices and learn about local crops and livestock. Children can participate in farm chores and enjoy fresh produce.
items.address: Km 8, Sapele-Warri Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Green Pastures Petting Farm
items.short_description: A gentle petting farm where children can interact safely with friendly farm animals like goats, sheep, and rabbits. Animal feeding sessions are available.
items.address: 22 Jakpa Road, Effurun, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Harvest Haven Barn
items.short_description: A seasonal attraction offering fruit picking, hayrides, and themed festivals during harvest seasons. Enjoy fresh farm treats and family fun.
items.address: Off Warri-Asaba Expressway, near Aladja, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Little Farmer's Funland
items.short_description: A farm-themed play area featuring mini tractors, a corn maze, and barn-style play structures. Kids can pretend to be farmers for a day.
items.address: Plot 9, Ekpan-Effurun Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Delta Wildlife Sanctuary
items.short_description: Home to a variety of animals native to the Niger Delta and Nigeria, with a strong focus on conservation and education. See local birds, monkeys, and reptiles.
items.address: Okparabe Road, Off Warri-Ughelli Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Kids' Critter Corner
items.short_description: A delightful petting zoo perfect for toddlers and young children. Interact with friendly goats, bunnies, guinea pigs, and gentle birds under supervision.
items.address: 34 Ugborikoko Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Safari Adventure Zoo Warri
items.short_description: Home to a range of exotic and indigenous animals displayed in spacious, simulated natural habitats. Offers a mini-safari experience and educational talks.
items.address: Off NPA Expressway, By Enerhen Junction, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Tropical Birds Aviary
items.short_description: A walk-through aviary featuring hundreds of colorful tropical birds from around the world and local species. Experience birds flying freely around you.
items.address: Km 5, Warri-Effurun Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Warri Wizardry Theatre
items.short_description: A grand theatre hosting spectacular magic and illusion shows suitable for all ages. Prepare to be amazed by disappearing acts, levitation, and more!
items.address: 7 Delta Mall Road, Effurun, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Enchanted Stage Performances
items.short_description: Intimate and engaging magic shows featuring close-up magic, comedy, and audience participation. A truly personal magical experience for smaller groups.
items.address: 19 Eburu Street, Okere, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Illusionist's Den
items.short_description: A mysterious venue where magic meets puzzles. Enjoy an illusion show with a narrative, incorporating elements of an escape room for an immersive experience.
items.address: Plot 15, Water Resources Road, Off Airport Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Junior Magician's Workshop
items.short_description: An interactive workshop where children learn simple magic tricks, develop stage presence, and even perform for their peers. Includes a mini magic kit.
items.address: 25 PTI Road, Ugborikoko, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Toon Town Plaza
items.short_description: A vibrant plaza where children can meet and greet their favorite classic and modern cartoon characters, take photos, and enjoy mini-parades.
items.address: Delta City Mall, Effurun, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Super Hero Headquarters
items.short_description: Aspiring heroes can train and meet their favorite superheroes. Interactive zones, hero challenges, and daily meet & greet sessions with iconic characters.
items.address: 14 Okumagba Layout, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Princess Palace Warri
items.short_description: A magical experience where children can meet beloved princesses, enjoy story time, and even partake in a royal tea party or dance.
items.address: Along Airport Road, By Warri Club, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Mascot Mania Zone
items.short_description: A fun-filled zone dedicated to mascots from local teams, popular brands, and original characters. High-energy interactions and dance-offs are common!
items.address: 30 Enerhen Road, Ugborikoko, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Brick City Builders Warri
items.short_description: An expansive park dedicated to LEGO, featuring large-scale models of famous landmarks, interactive building stations, and a massive free-play zone.
items.address: Off Warri-Sapele Road, Near PTI, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Mega Blocks Construction Site
items.short_description: Designed for younger children, this zone features oversized foam blocks for creative building, soft play areas, and supervised construction challenges.
items.address: 50 Jakpa Road, Effurun, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Warri Architecture Workshop
items.short_description: An educational and creative space where children use LEGO bricks to replicate famous Warri landmarks and design their own future cityscapes.
items.address: 11 Okere Road, Warri, Delta State

items.name: Kiddy Konstruktion Zone
items.short_description: A safe and stimulating environment for the youngest builders, offering oversized soft blocks, DUPLO, and other child-friendly construction toys.
items.address: Old Airport Road, Ugborikoko, Warri, Delta State
